name: net::Shutdown
doc_adt: Possible values which can be passed to the [`TcpStream::shutdown`] method.

VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).name: Read
VariantIdx(Some(0))-FieldIdx(None).doc: The reading portion of the [`TcpStream`] should be shut down. All currently blocked and future [reads] will return [Ok]\(0). [reads]: crate::io::Read "io::Read"

VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).name: Write
VariantIdx(Some(1))-FieldIdx(None).doc:
The writing portion of the [`TcpStream`] should be shut down.

 All currently blocked and future [writes] will return an error.

 [writes]: crate::io::Write "io::Write"

VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).name: Both
VariantIdx(Some(2))-FieldIdx(None).doc:
Both the reading and the writing portions of the [`TcpStream`] should be shut down.

 See [`Shutdown::Read`] and [`Shutdown::Write`] for more information.
